attributes.action: reduce mp wages and freeze until minimum wage meets living wage, and challenge to live off minimum wage.
attributes.additional_details: I am asking that all mp’s who earn more than £30,000 per year, take a 25% pay cut to help in the cuts towards the deficit. I also ask that NO mp’s have any pay rises until the minimum wage meets the same amount as the living wage, without endangering small businesses. And I challenge any mp especially the prime minister, to live on only minimum wage for 6 months, to experience what many working families have to deal with.
